Docs.summary: Provides a mechanism for the hosting environment to supply its own default notion of <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate provides a mechanism for a hosting environment to supply its own default notion of <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>. It is called when <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A> is `null`, and there is no current <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> that indicates that the ambient transaction may have been suppressed.
